videoJson.name: 2" Quad
videoJson.fact1: This format was the broadcast standard from its invention until the debut of 1" Type C in 1976
videoJson.fact2: This format was used by broadcast television companies to air a show at the same time on East and West US coasts
videoJson.fact3: Most video formats used helical scanning, where video is scanned diagonally, but 2" Quad is based on quadrature scanning, a method where 4 video heads scan video tape at a 90° angle
